announce.text: Auto-announcements: Please remember our new Event Currency ''Golden Apigas'' are fully trade-ables, while the bronze ones aren't. To get a Golden Apiga you must trade 10 Event - Apiga to Prinz at his Currency Shop.
Auto-announcements: Gainak Siege drops have been reviewed! Don't miss your chance!
Auto-announcements: The GMShop, Class Master, Global Teleporter and NPCBuffer are in your Magic Gem (look at your inventory!)
Auto-announcements: Are you looking for server information? Check the Community Board (ALT + B)!
Auto-announcements: Never miss an Automated Event or Gainak Siege! There you can collect the new Event - Apigas to trade for great rewards!
Auto-announcements: The farm zones have been remade! You should give them a try!
Auto-announcements: Never share your account information!
Auto-announcements: We're working on a new server! Check the forum to contribute!
